meanings: (관계되다) affect, have ((something)) to do with, have influence on, concern, involve

vlive.korean: 눈썹에 관해선... 제가 감히 눈썹 마스터라고 할 수 있는데요. To talk about brows... I can call myself a brow master. 듣기 View video V Beauty : [데이지] Suzy inspired daily makeup 가을음영수지메이크업
vlive.english: To talk about brows... I can call myself a brow master.

vlive.korean: 공식 색에 관해선 아까 한껏 떠들었기 때문에 넘어가도록 하겠습니다. Since we talked about our official colors for a long time, we won't do it anymore. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] 세븐틴 데뷔 500일 자축 안드로메다 방송
vlive.english: Since we talked about our official colors for a long time, we won't do it anymore.

vlive.korean: [해설자이나 게임에 관해선 무지한 슈가] 내가 해설하는 사람인데 전혀 몰라서... [Suga, the game commentator who knows nothing] I am a commentator but I know nothing about it. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2017 - EP.25
vlive.english: [Suga, the game commentator who knows nothing] I am a commentator but I know nothing about it.

vlive.korean: 좁쌀 여드름요? 제가 여드름에 관해선 이거 다 하고 말씀 드릴게요. Papules? I'll talk about pimples afterward. 듣기 View video V Beauty : 민가든의 돈 안드는 꿀피부 스킨케어법 no money skincare
vlive.english: Papules? I'll talk about pimples afterward.

vlive.korean: 어떤 주제에 관해서. On a certain subject. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 57

examples.korean: He is an architectophile. He knows everything about architecture. 발음듣기 그는 건축광이다. 건축에 관해선 모든 것을 안다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: He is an architectophile. He knows everything about architecture. 발음

examples.korean: I'm not sure about it. 발음듣기 그것에 관해선 확실히 모르겠다. Neungyule
examples.english: I'm not sure about it. 발음

examples.korean: Take the problem up with Mr. Kim. 발음듣기 그 문제에 관해선 미스터 김과 이야기하세요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Take the problem up with Mr. Kim. 발음

examples.korean: If the two sides join issue with each other against, it will be disasterous for party unity. 발음듣기 만약 두 파가 서로 대립한다면 당의 통합에 관해선 매우 참담한 일이 될 것이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If the two sides join issue with each other against, it will be disasterous for party unity. 발음

examples.korean: I refer you to my former employer as to my character. 발음듣기 저에 관해선 전 고용주에게 알아보시기 바랍니다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I refer you to my former employer as to my character. 발음
